attributes.action: To memorialize the Israelis Murdered by Palestinian Terrorists at the 1972 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge the government to erect a memorial at the London Olympic park village to remember the members of the Israeli Olympic team murdered by Palestinian terrorists in the 1972 Munich games.

The London Olympic games will mark 40 years since the Munich massacre. In modern times, Islamic terrorism has become a global phenomenon, and the time has come to pay our respects to its early victims.
